repos.description: Stores the markdown documents used to generate docs.openrewrite.org

commands.name: /create-js-recipe
commands.description: Create an OpenRewrite recipe in TypeScript/JavaScript for a specific problem

frontmatter.name: create-js-recipe
frontmatter.description: Create an OpenRewrite recipe in TypeScript/JavaScript for a specific problem

commands.content: Use the writing-openrewrite-recipes-js skill to create a recipe for: {{args}}

commands.name: /create-recipe
commands.description: Create an OpenRewrite recipe for a specific problem

frontmatter.name: create-recipe
frontmatter.description: Create an OpenRewrite recipe for a specific problem

commands.content: Use the writing-openrewrite-recipes skill to create a recipe for: {{args}}

skills.name: writing-openrewrite-recipes-js
skills.description: This skill should be used when authoring OpenRewrite recipes in TypeScript for automated code transformations. Covers recipe structure, visitor patterns, pattern matching, templates, testing strategies, and troubleshooting.

frontmatter.name: writing-openrewrite-recipes-js
frontmatter.description: This skill should be used when authoring OpenRewrite recipes in TypeScript for automated code transformations. Covers recipe structure, visitor patterns, pattern matching, templates, testing strategies, and troubleshooting.

skills.name: writing-openrewrite-recipes
skills.description: Use when creating/writing/building OpenRewrite recipes, working with .java recipe files, RewriteTest files, recipe YAML files, LST visitors, JavaTemplate, visitor patterns, or when discussing recipe types (declarative YAML, Refaster templates, imperative Java recipes) - guides creation of OpenRewrite recipes for automated code transformations, AST manipulation, custom refactoring rules, and code migration.

frontmatter.name: writing-openrewrite-recipes
frontmatter.description: Use when creating/writing/building OpenRewrite recipes, working with .java recipe files, RewriteTest files, recipe YAML files, LST visitors, JavaTemplate, visitor patterns, or when discussing recipe types (declarative YAML, Refaster templates, imperative Java recipes) - guides creation of OpenRewrite recipes for automated code transformations, AST manipulation, custom refactoring rules, and code migration.
frontmatter.allowed-tools: Read, Write, Edit, Bash, Grep, Glob
